title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 375 - ENVIRONMENTAL REMEDIATION PROGRAMS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 375 - ENVIRONMENTAL REMEDIATION PROGRAMS
State Regulations

Subpart 375-1 - General Remedial Program Requirements (§ 375-1.1 to 375-1.12)

Subpart 375-2 - Inactive Hazardous Waste Disposal Site Remedial Program (§ 375-2.1 to 375-2.11)

Subpart 375-3 - Brownfield Cleanup Program (§ 375-3.1 to 375-3.11)

Subpart 375-4 - Environmental Restoration Program (§ 375-4.1 to 375-4.11)

Subpart 375-6 - REMEDIAL PROGRAM SOIL CLEANUP OBJECTIVES (§ 375-6.1 to 375-6.9)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 375

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, art. 1, § 0101; art. 27, titles 13, 14; art. 52, title 3; art. 56, title 5; art. 71, title 36; art. 3, § 0301; L. 2003, ch. 1; L. 2004, ch. 577; and

State Finance Law, art. 6, §
97-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
